1289400.name: Moving Out - Original Soundtrack
1289400.description:
Moving Out Original Soundtrack


流畅的音乐律动能协助你顺利进行搬家工作，而《Moving Out》原声带就能完全提供这样的氛围。享受传奇作曲家 Lenny“ The Touch” Macaluso 创作的 16 首 80 年代风格器乐歌曲，非常适合在各种混乱的搬家过程中聆听！

曲目列表：
1. Moving Power (feat. Greg Evigan)
Lenny Mac
2. Movin' & Groovin'
Lenny Mac
3. Tight
Lenny Mac
4. Still Got It (feat. Rick Bell)
Lenny Mac
5. So Smooth
Rick Bell
6. Bodacious
Geoff Levin Band
7. Rockin' Moves
Lenny Mac
8. Rad
Lenny Mac
9. Way To Go
Lenny Mac
10. Slam Dunk
Funk Brothers
11. One Track Mind - Moving Power
Greg Evigan
12. One Track Mind 1987
Greg Evigan
13. Skin Tight - Movin' & Groovin'
Mendy Lee
14. Cheapshot - Tight
Vanessa
15. I Wasn't Born Yesterday - Still Got It
Mendy Lee
16. Operator - Way To Go
Mendy Lee
17. Never Surrender [Bonus Track]
Lenny Mac featuring Joe Lamont
18. Thunder In Your Heart [Bonus Track]
Lenny Mac featuring Joe "Bean" Esposito
19. Never Surrender [Bonus Track]
Stan Bush from "Kickboxer"
